name: Hartmut Wiehle
comment: ''Mr. Phukan as a freelancer, played an integral role in the development and relaunching of our new dynamic company website. He designed, developed and launched a fault-proof website with all its tools and databases within a short time-frame, all while keeping a close cooperation with the management. His agile way of working is indeed commendable and I highly recommend him to anyone looking for IT expertise ''

name: Rahul Bordoloi
comment: Borneel's exceptional talents have made a significant impact on our team's productivity. Borneel is my top recommendation, both as a team member and a leader.

name: Abhishek Mondal
comment: I've worked closely with Borneel in Codepth. He is a very passionate learner, an enthusiastic coder and a self-motivated person. He can come up with unique ideas and solutions to problems presented before him. He's also very helpful towards his fellow colleagues and persons around him.
